body:
This is a regression from https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/pull/2358.

Been looking into this with @jmarantz and @danielhochman and I think we have a lead on the issue. @jmarantz will continue to investigate but FYI for anyone using master.

```
Backtrace:
#0  insert (key=..., this=0x3898028) at bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/external/envoy/source/common/common/_virtual_includes/shared_memory_hash_set_lib/common/common/shared_memory_hash_set.h:188

#3  0x000000000054aeb0 in Envoy::Stats::ThreadLocalStoreImpl::ScopeImpl::counter (this=0x41d1200, name=...) at external/envoy/source/common/stats/thread_local_store.cc:146

#7  0x00000000005df0d2 in Envoy::Http::Http2::ConnectionImpl::onFrameReceived (this=0x88dc4d8, frame=0xe299398) at external/envoy/source/common/http/http2/codec_impl.cc:403
```

title: shared memory hash set crash
